sense.name: Go after with the intent to follow or catch.
sense.examples: The policeman taled the muggr down the alley. The dog tailed the rabbit for a half a mile. Operatives tailed the subjects as subversives.

sense.name: Remove or shorten the tail of an animal.
sense.examples: Tail the puppies when they are a few days old. Owners may tail jumping horses as a matter of aesthetics.

sense.name: Remove the bottom or stalk, as of fruits or berries.
sense.examples: Top and tail the fruit, then peel and segment. Tail the apples to form a solid base for the fruit sculpture.
